s.text: I will give our lawyer your contact when I hear from you with your contact info, so we can discuss further arrangement on this transaction.I wait for your favorable reply.
I will give our lawyer your contact when I hear from you with your contact info, so we can discuss further arrangement on this transaction.I wait for your favorable reply.

And any attempt for me to try and move this fund alone in my name will cause me more problems than I can imagine as an African young boy, as the government may bent on taking this money from me and my sister.
Please NOTE that the earlier you help me the better as you will be doing God a great favor because our lives are no more safe with these people over here.
Meanwhile, my father left an order with the depositary that without me, presenting a foreign partner that the company should not mind me.

And any attempt for me to try and move this fund alone in my name will cause me more problems than I can imagine as an African young boy, as the government may bent on taking this money from me and my sister.

I have all the documents of the deposit given to me by my late father and also the lawyer will help us get all necessary documents that will enable you receive this boxes on our behalf in your country for us to come over in your country for investment.

The main reason of contacting you is to solicit your help in coming forward to help us claim the fund as my late father instructed and after that we will move the Money to your Country for an investment.

Once you agree to help us move this fund, we will link you up with our late father's lawyer who endorsed his signatures during the day my father was depositing the fund so that he can brief you more better.

Please my dear beloved, our plans now are to relocate from Ghana since we can not afford to go back to Liberia following our past experience as they killed our parents, but we will need to move out the fund left by my late father here in Ghana.
They allegedly said that, my late parents have a close relationship with former president of Liberia (Charles Taylor) that was their reason of storming our home.

I have all the documents of the deposit given to me by my late father and also the lawyer will help us get all necessary documents that will enable you receive this boxes on our behalf in your country for us to come over in your country for investment.

Please NOTE that the earlier you help me the better as you will be doing God a great favor because our lives are no more safe with these people over here.
So please let me know what will be your compensation for helping me and my sister out?

I have all the documents of the deposit given to me by my late father and also the lawyer will help us get all necessary documents that will enable you receive this boxes on our behalf in your country for us to come over in your country for investment.
It all depends on our trusting each other but I've chosen to contact you prayerfully and believing that you are the person to help me.

I am contacting you about a need I have and I believe you are well able to help me.
Please NOTE that the earlier you help me the better as you will be doing God a great favor because our lives are no more safe with these people over here.
So please let me know what will be your compensation for helping me and my sister out?
I will need your reply stating your readiness to help in seeing this through.

Today I and my younger sister find for ourselves in Ghana.
And life has been very difficult since the government of Ghana started their deportation exercise which says that we refugees should evacuate their Bujumbura refugee camp to our various countries.
Date: Thu, 10 Feb 2011 10:33:55 -0800 (PST) From: Godfred Nana <godfrednana2011@att.net> Reply-To: godfred_nana@yahoo.com Subject: I NEED YOUR HELP To: undisclosed recipients: ;
I am Mr.Godfred Nana, 30yrs of age; I became an orphan some couple of years ago.
